casebody.data:
Karen HALBRITTER; and Keolis Transit Services, LLC, Petitioners,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and Larry C. Johns, Judge Pro Tempore, Respondents,
and
Cherylethia Beaudoin, Individually and on Behalf of Armani Beaudoin, a Minor; Uriah Candler, a Minor; Deaangel Candler; and Jacque Lacour, Real Parties in Interest. No. 76204 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED JULY 24, 2019

DENIED.
